properties.entry: The "extract-image-data" command copies image data out of a texture file.
The "show-sections" command lists the sections in a given texture file.
The "show-summary" command shows a summary of a given texture file.
The "show-version" command displays the format version of a given texture file.
The "show-image-info" command displays the image info in a given texture file.
The "show-metadata" command displays the metadata in a given texture file.
The "version" command displays the current application version.
The "create" command creates textures from existing images.
The "check" command exhaustively validates texture files.
